author: By Jake Sherman and Anna Palmer
title: How one Trump tweet put a deal in doubt
description: And a House panel warns that coronavirus could destroy the Postal Service by June.
content:
President Donald Trump tweeted disapprovingly of the coronavirus response bill on Monday night, throwing into question Republicans' support of the deal. | Alex Brandon/AP Photo
